title: mnw0610

content: Hi I am a newbie here.Â  Looking for someone to lend me 0.044BTC.I have no collateral.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: mnw0610 on December 13, 2022, 08:42:09 AMHi I am a newbie here. Â Looking for someone to lend me 0.044BTC.I have no collateral.Newbie with red trust asks for no collateral loan.Sounds like asking for a "donation". And begging is not allowed, you know...

comments.author: mnw0610
comments.body: I know I risk being called names, scammer and so on.But I am genuinely looking for help.If I can find someone kind enough to lend me the money, it will be good.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: The OP should have said they have no self-respect.

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Quote from: mnw0610 on December 13, 2022, 08:53:39 AMI know I risk being called names, scammer and so on.But I am genuinely looking for help.If I can find someone kind enough to lend me the money, it will be good.You should try these kind of tactics in a job interview. That would give you better odds of earning money. Maybe some interviewer falls pity on you and agrees to provide a job. Nobody cares about you here (no contribution at all)and your words have no value, stop wasting time and get a good life, lol. I know you can do it mate ðŸ˜‰

comments.body: I am seriously looking for a loan.I will repay in 3 days.
